news.title: In Flashpoint for the Rebellion Against Big Tech, Sonos Sues Google for Patent Infringement
news.description: Smart audio company Sonos has filed a lawsuit against Google alleging infringement of patented technology Sonos had shared with Google in an attempt to collaborate.

news.title: Two iPhones or the Privacy of Billions: Why Apple vs. the FBI Matters
news.description: Apple continues to refuse the FBI’s requests to unlock the iPhones of a deceased Saudi national accused of fatally shooting three people at a Florida naval base in December.

news.title: Inside the Billion-Dollar Battle Over .Org
news.description: Ethos Capital, a private equity firm, announced its intent to buy the “.org” top-level domain, sparking backlash.

news.title: How the Police Use Facial Recognition, and Where It Falls Short
news.description: A facial-recognition system used by police in Florida exemplifies the potential risks and rewards of such technologies in law enforcement.
